comments: Previous name was: A simple grammar.
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 734
maple: spec := [S,{B=Set(Z,1 <= card),S=Prod(Z,Z,B,B,B)},labeled]: seq(combstruct[count](spec,size=n), n=0..20); # end of programseq(6*(n^2-n)*combinat[stirling2](n-2,3), n=0..20);  # _Mark van Hoeij_, May 29 2013
prog: (PARI) x='x+O('x^66); concat([0,0,0,0,0], Vec( serlaplace( x^2*exp(x)^3-3*x^2*exp(x)^2+3*exp(x)*x^2-x^2))) \\ _Joerg Arndt_, May 29 2013
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: New name using e.g.f., _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 01 2013
